title: Morpho Protocol
description: Master the efficiency of peer-to-peer matching and the trustless nature of Morpho Blue.

questions.text: What is the core architectural innovation of Morpho Blue?
options: A monolithic pool for all assets
A trustless, immutable, and permissionless lending primitive

questions.text: How does Morpho Optimizer improve rates for users?
options: By charging higher fees to lenders
By matching lenders and borrowers peer-to-peer on top of underlying pools

questions.text: In the context of MetaMorpho, what is a 'Curator'?
options: An entity that designs the UI
An automated bot that trades on DEXs
A risk expert that manages vault allocations and risk parameters
A user who only provides liquidity

questions.text: Which of these is NOT a parameter of a Morpho Blue market?
What does 'LLTV' stand for in Morpho Blue?

title: AAVE Protocol
description: Explore the liquidity market titan, from Flash Loans to V3 Efficiency Mode.

questions.text: What is the primary characteristic of an Aave Flash Loan?
options: It must be repaid within 24 hours
It must be borrowed and repaid within the same blockchain transaction
It is only available to institutional investors
Efficiency Mode for high LTV between correlated assets

questions.text: Which token is the native decentralized stablecoin of the Aave ecosystem?

options: Governance tokens used for voting only
Interest-bearing tokens that increase in value/amount as interest accrues
Tokens used to pay gas fees on Aave

questions.text: What is the 'Safety Module' in Aave used for?
options: Staking AAVE to act as a backstop in case of a shortfall event

title: Sablier
description: Understand continuous streaming of tokens and real-time payroll mechanics.

questions.text: How does Sablier distribute tokens over time?
options: Only when the sender triggers a release

questions.text: In Sablier V2, what technology is used to represent a stream?
What happens when a sender 'cancels' a cancelable stream?
options: Remaining unstreamed tokens are returned to the sender
All tokens are sent to the recipient immediately
The stream is paused but tokens stay in the contract

questions.text: What is a 'Linear Stream' in Sablier?
options: A stream that releases tokens based on a curve
A stream that releases tokens at a constant rate over time
A stream with a random release schedule

questions.text: Which of these can be a 'Recipient' of a Sablier stream?
options: Any valid Ethereum address or smart contract
Only addresses that have passed KYC
